title: I have been wrongfully banned
body:
My account was banned for "malicious use of a third-party software". I have never used a third party program nor would I even know how to get one. I have no way to dispute this because my account has been banned and I can't log in. Somebody please help. This account means a lot to me. 

Note: My account got hacked a week ago and the person gifted themselves all of my essence. I changed my password but I'm thinking it might have something to do with them
